description:
Fusion is a Sega SG1000, SC3000, SF7000, Master System, Game Gear, Genesis/Megadrive, SVP, Pico, SegaCD/MegaCD and 32X emulator for Win9x/ME/2000/XP/Vista/Win7.
	
	Please consider to donate to the development of Kega Fusion, and other new projects from Steve Snake, by donating on the [project page](http://www.carpeludum.com/kega-fusion/).
	
	All files will be installed to `%ChocolateyBinRoot%`.
summary: An emulator for various Sega systems with network support.
author: Steve Snake
